Patience is the key to success

arabic: الثقة في النفس تساعدك على تحقيق الأهداف
how_to_read: Al-ṯiqah fī an-nafs tusāʿiduk ʿalā taḥqīq al-aḥdāf
english: Self-confidence helps you achieve your goals
Learning is a lifelong journey
Creativity comes from attention to detail
Listening well enhances understanding
Knowledge is light
Life is short, so always smile
Friendship is a treasure
Hard work leads to success
Courage requires challenges
Forgiveness makes the world a better place
Knowledge is the key to understanding
Optimism is the secret to success
Friends are the treasures of life
Love conquers words
Respect is the foundation of good relationships
Friendship means you are not alone
Life is beautiful when you smile
Hope is the strength of the soul
